reviews.name: Duy Nguy·ªÖn
reviews.review: The restaurant's decor is quite nice, with many shooting angles, suitable for a few photo shoots. The shop is located in front of the coffee roasting factory, so sometimes the smell of coffee from the factory is very unpleasant, and the shop plays music quite loudly

reviews.name: Hoang Loi
reviews.review:
- Beautiful restaurant, many views, close, comfortable and reasonably arranged space
- The only thing is that next to the coffee mill, there's so much smoke, it's so stuffy!

reviews.name: Thi√™n Huy
reviews.review:
1. Advantages
a) The restaurant space is large and airy.
b) There are many beautiful angles to take pictures.
2. Limitations
There are a lot of mosquitoes so apply Soffell before going.

reviews.name: Ng·ªçc ƒê·ªó
reviews.review:
Spacious restaurant, cool view. Decor ok. There are also mirrors and multiple shooting angles. Quiet space.
I went in the evening to sit outside and there were a bit of mosquitoes during this season, but the shop had mosquito coils so that helped.

As for the menu, I think the price is okay, not expensive or cheap. The drink is not very sharp, the peach tea is a bit sweet. The shop should check the more trendy way of mixing water. Water is also very important, not just having a beautiful view is ok.

Spacious parking lot. I think the staff is also ok.

Overall quite good. Everyone should go try it.

reviews.name: Honi Decal D√°n T∆∞·ªùng Cho B√©
reviews.review: The restaurant costs 10 VND, the atmosphere is so close to Christmas that the restaurant is reasonable. Entering the shop, there is a delicious aroma of coffee. The space is large, airy, the staff is cute with cheese sticks, I asked my 6 year old son to ask for filtered water, asked him to bring the water himself and the cute staff brought it to him. 5 stars

reviews.name: Abadfn Bbzatbm
reviews.review:
When it's raining, it's crowded but the staff... doesn't guide customers to the table or just a place to stay in the rain. Customers have to wait until they get a seat, but they still wish they could.
The shop needs to pay more attention to this part.

reviews.name: ZERDALI
reviews.review: I experienced it and found the restaurant to be ok, the atmosphere is airy and comfortable. I went on a rainy day so it was cool, but on a sunny day, I don't know. The restaurant is clean. When I went, the wait staff was ok and didn't see anything annoying. There are also quite a few corners for us to take pictures, the water is ok, I think the price is reasonable compared to the level in Can Tho, which is also normal. Everyone should come and experience it üíåüíå

reviews.name: Tuy·∫øt Nhi L√™
reviews.review: Personally, I'm someone who often goes to Pham's coffee shop. Every time the service is quite good, especially today at the Pham branch in the forest, I met a staff member ordering water with a bad attitude. Even though we joked around with each other a few times when ordering, but it wasn't related to her, she still showed an unpleasant attitude (we still ordered drinks for her, very bth). The guy refused to give us the bill with an expression like she didn't like the customer. Only when another staff member reminded us that she was ordering water for the customer did he start to press the bill. I hope Pham's team will try to fix your attitude so that the staff can be friendly with customers to bring a better experience in the future.

The staff's attitude is unpleasant when we sit for a long time even though we order more than a dozen glasses of water. Overall it's bad!

reviews.name: Khang
reviews.review: The staff's attitude is too bad, they glance at the customers, our group of 11 people go from 8am to 2pm, I know our group stays for a long time but each person in my group buys 2 glasses of water with an average price of 34 to 39, we stay until 12pm and then we start. The first time you see an LGBT friend, don't look away, then look away. Last time our group went, we saw bth, but this time it was too bad.

reviews.name: Tuy·∫øt Nga L√™ Th·ªã
reviews.review:
Today I stopped by Pham3, my friend ordered and went with Pham3 and I was at Pham2. I also missed the order before I could drink it, then my friend said it was Pham3. I just finished ordering, so I dropped the bich and took it to Pham3 immediately and then went to Pham3. You asked me to order, I said my friend had ordered Pham3 and I said it was strange but he said I had to order more or else I would have to pay a surcharge of 30k but Pham, the country of Pham's order is the same as any other side as long as you don't buy water. Another place is fine, but why do you guys say that? I don't know if you're joking or serious, but in my opinion, I'm not happy or satisfied. And the room is cold, so I said why isn't it cold? Then you change too many guests in and out. The door was closed so it wasn't cold and I couldn't understand the conversation. I drank at Pham1's house from the time it opened until the branch opened, all the staff were always happy and cute, but as for Pham 3, I was disappointed in the way Pham3 staff talked.
My friends and I will never visit Pham3 again.
Thanks for listening.
